definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 45:23 (he)-ass (NH id. (sts. female, but this regularly [[חֲמוֹרָה]]); Aram. [[הֲמָרָא]] h.moro0 Ar. h.imarah;un, Palm. [[חמרא]] Reckendorf:ZMG 1888, 404; as imêru, Schr:Cot Gloss;—name fr. reddish colour)—abs. [[חֲמוֹר]] Ge 22:5 + 43 t.; [[חֲמׂר]] Ex 13:13, De 22:10; cstr. [[חֲמוֹר]] Ex 23:5 + 4 t.; [[הֲמׂר]] Ge 49:14; sf. [[חֲמׂרְךָ]] De 5:14, De 28:31; [[חֲמׂרֶָךָ]] Ex 23:12; [[חֲמׂרוֹ]] Ge 22:3 + 8 t.; pl. [[חֲמוֹרִים]] Ju Jdg 19:10 + 9 t.; [[חֲמׂרִיס]] Ge 12:16 + 16 t.; sf. [[חֲמוֹרֵינוּ]] Ju Jdg 19:19; [[חֲמׂרֵינוּ]] Ge 43:18; [[חֲמוֹרֵיכֶם]] 1Sa 8:16; [[חֲמׂרֵיהֶם]] Ge 34:28 + 4 t.; [[חֲמוֹרֵיהֶם]] Jos 9:4; —ass (he-ass; [[אתון]] = she-ass) found in all periods (coll. only Ge 32:6, Is 21:7);—

as (valuable) property, with oxen, sheep, camels, slaves, etc. Ge 12:16, Ge 24:35, Ge 30:48, Ge 47:17, Ex 9:3 (all J) Ex 20:17 (E), Ex 21:33, Ex 22:8, Ex 22:8, Ex 22:9, Ex 23:4, Ex 23:5, Ex 23:12, Nu 16:15, Jos 6:21, Jos 7:24 (all JE); note also Ex 13:13 = Ex 34:20 (JE; firstlings belong to ´[[י]]); Ge 36:24, Nu 31:28, Nu 31:30, Nu 31:34, Nu 31:39, Nu 31:45 (all P); De 5:14, De 5:18, De 22:3, De 22:4, Ju Jdg 6:4, 1Sa 8:16, 1Sa 12:3, 1Sa 15:3, 1Sa 22:19, 1Sa 27:9, 1Ch 5:21, Ezr 2:67 = Ne 7:68 (Baer), Zec 14:15; coll. Ge 32:5 (J; ‖[[שׁוֹר]]), [[חאׁן]], [[עֶבֶד]], [[שִׁפְחָה]], but pl. (similar ‖) Ge 34:28 (P), Ge 47:17 (J); cf. also [[יְתוֹמִים]] ´[[ח]] Job 24:3 the orphans' ass (‖[[שׁוֹר אַלְמָנׇה]]); as knowing its master's crib Is 1:3 (‖[[שׁוֹר]]); found in camp 2Ki 7:7, 2Ki 7:10 (both ‖[[סוּסִים]]); as harnessed ´[[מֶתֶג לַה]] Pr 26:3 (‖[[סוּס]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[חֶמֶד חמורים]] a pair of asses 2Sa 16:1 (for burdens and for riding); for man and woman Ju Jdg 19:3, Jdg 19:10, Jdg 19:19, Jdg 19:21; carrying dead body v:Jdg 19:28, cf. ´[[ח]] 1Ki 13:29.

beast of burden Ge 22:3, Ge 22:5 (cf. v:Ge 22:6), Ge 42:26, Ge 42:27, Ge 45:23 (all E) Ge 43:18, Ge 43:24, Ge 44:3, Ge 44:13 (all J), Jos 9:4 (JE), 1Sa 25:18, 1Ch 12:41, Ne 13:15 (cf. also ´[[חֶמֶד ח]] 2Sa 16:1 supr.); metaph. of Issachar [[נׇּ֑רֶם]] ´[[ח]] Ge 49:14 (poem), an ass of (strong) bones.—[[לֶחֶם]] ´[[ח]] 1Sa 16:20 rd. prob. [[חֲמִשָּׁה]] five, or better [[עֲשָׂרָה]] ten, v. We Dr.
used in tillage Is 32:20; not to be used in ploughing with an ox ([[שׁוֹר]]) De 22:10.

parts of body of ass mentioned are: ´[[לְחִי ח]] Ju Jdg 15:15, Jdg 15:16 jawbone, Samson's weapon; ´[[ראׁשׁ ח]] 2Ki 6:25 eaten in famine; ´[[בְּשַׂר ה]] Ez Eze 23:20 genital organ of ass (contempt. sim.)
´[[קְבוּרַת ה]] Je 22:19 burial of an ass, in fig. of ignominious treatment of a corpse.
